page.title: 05EDUCATION
page.content: {COATES SCHOOL - WINTER AND SPRING.} WE HAD A LOT OF SNOW IN THE WINTER AND THE SCHOOL WAS CLOSED FOR ONE DAY AS THE TEACHERS COULDN'T REACH COATES. MRS.TOWILL CAME TO TAKE US FOR MUSIC. WE LEARN TO PLAY THE DESCANT AND TREBLE RECORDERS. SHE ALSO TAUGHT US THE SONGS FOR THE MUSIC FESTIVAL.SEVEN OF US TOOK PART AND WE WENT TO SEVERAL REHEARSALS IN CIRENCESTER.THE FESTIVAL WAS HELD IN THE EVENING IN MARCH. THREE CHILDREN TOOK PART IN THE SWIMMING GALA.THE INFANTS TOOK PART IN A MOTHERING SUNDAY SERVICE AT THE CHURCH. WE HAD A SALE IN THE VILLAGE HALL AND RAISED Â£88 FOR SCHOOL FUNDS. THIS SUMMER P.C.SLINN HAS TAKEN US FOR CYCLING PROFICIENCY AND SEVEN CHILDREN PASSED THEIR TEST. WE HAD AN ASCENSION DAY SERVICE IN THE CHURCH. THE DENTIST INSPECTED OUR TEETH AND LET US ALL INSPECT THE DENTAL VAN.
